@graph.caption: Easy Chickpea flour pancakes with grated cauliflower and shiitake mushrooms. These are fat pancakes made with a thick chickpea flour batter. Add more water for thinner batter and thinner pancakes. Makes 5 fat pancakes.

itemListElement.name: Chickpea Flour Pancakes/mini Omelettes with Cauliflower and Shiitake mushrooms. Glutenfree Vegan Recipe

@graph.name: Chickpea Flour Pancakes/mini Omelettes with Cauliflower and Shiitake mushrooms. Glutenfree Vegan Recipe
@graph.description: Easy Chickpea flour pancakes with grated cauliflower and shiitake mushrooms. These are fat pancakes made with a thick chickpea flour batter. Add more water for thinner batter and thinner pancakes. Makes 5 fat pancakes.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon ranch seasoning (or other seasoning mixes like chipotle, cajun, taco, garam masala)
a generous pinch (1/8 teaspoon of baking soda)
a generous pinch of kala namak/indian black salt (optional. Add for eggy taste)
3-4  Shiitake mushrooms  (or other fresh mushrooms finely chopped 1/3-1/2 cup)
1/2  chili pepper finely chopped (I used Jalapeno)
Add 1-2 tsp sriracha to the batter
Add shredded cheese shreds to the batter.
Add other veggies and finely chopped greens.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix all the Dry ingredients. Whisk well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix all the Dry ingredients. Whisk well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a cup of water and whisk to combine into a smooth lump-free batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a cup of water and whisk to combine into a smooth lump-free batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the veggies and vinegar and mix to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the veggies and vinegar and mix to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop ladle full of the batter on a greased hot pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop ladle full of the batter on a greased hot pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Press and spread to even out into a fat pancake thickness.
recipeInstructions.name: Press and spread to even out into a fat pancake thickness.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with a lid and cook on medium heat for 6-7 minutes. Cover for at least 4 minutes and then cook without.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with a lid and cook on medium heat for 6-7 minutes. Cover for at least 4 minutes and then cook without.

recipeInstructions.text: You can also cook them without the lid. It will take a minute or so longer.
recipeInstructions.name: You can also cook them without the lid. It will take a minute or so longer.

recipeInstructions.text: Flip and cook for another 5-6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Flip and cook for another 5-6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with sauces of choice, mushroom gravy, roasted veggies and more. or make breakfast sandwiches with them.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with sauces of choice, mushroom gravy, roasted veggies and more. or make breakfast sandwiches with them.
